# Erdős #109 - The Erdős Sumset Conjecture

## Problem Statement

Any A ⊆ ℕ of positive upper density contains a sumset B + C where both B and C are infinite.

## Status

**Erdős Database Status**: SOLVED (Moreira-Richter-Robertson 2019)

**Formalization**: COMPLETE (2026-01-14)
